Invocation Name: multipurpose room
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Multipurpose Room is K-12’s podcast dedicated to helping school organizations and 
school administrations achieve their goals. Each episode discusses real-life topics that PTAs, PTOs, and school staff are dealing with, or have dealt with, and offers practical tips, learnings, and best practices to achieve their desired outcomes.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
